cast.name: 洛福斯·温莱特 Rufus Wainwright

this_title: Rufus! Rufus! Rufus! Does Judy! Judy! Judy!
introduction: While Rufus Does Judy at Carnegie Hall captures Rufus' June 2006 performance in New York City, this film contains footage from a later concert at the LondonPalladium, which occurred in February 2007.Special guests include Martha Wainwright ("Stormy Weather"), Kate McGarrigle (piano, "Over the Rainbow") and Lorna Luft ("After You've Gone").Note: A television program titled Rufus! Rufus! Rufus! Does Judy! Judy! Judy! aired in the UK in August of 2007; it contained nearly half of the songs that appear on the DVD.1.   Overture: The Trolley Song / Over the Rainbow / The Man That Got Away2.   When You're Smiling (The Whole World Smiles With You)3.   Medley: Almost Like Being in Love / This Can't Be Love4.   Do it Again5.   You Go to My Head6.   Alone Together7.   Who Cares? (So Long As You Care For Me)8.   Puttin' On the Ritz9.   How Long Has This Been Going On?10.   Just You, Just Me11.   The Man That Got Away12.   San Francisco13.   That's Entertainment14.   I Can't Give You Anything But Love15.   Come Rain Or Come Shine16.   You're Nearer17.   A Foggy Day18.   If Love Were All19.   Zing! Went the Strings of My Heart20.   Stormy Weather21.   Medley: You Made Me Love You / For Me & My Gal / The Trolley Song22.   Rock-A-Bye Your Baby With A Dixie Melody23.   Over the Rainbow24.   Swanee25.   After You've Gone26.   Chicago
chinese_title: Rufus! Rufus! Rufus! Does Judy! Judy! Judy!
